description: This file implements the data management functions for the Sys Info Repository Object, including folder and record manipulation such as adding, deleting, resetting, and retrieving folders and records by name or index.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2AddFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PSYS_IROV2_FOLDER_ENTRY pCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Adds a folder with support for nested paths under a specified parent folder.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2AddFolder2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PSYS_IROV2_FOLDER_ENTRY pCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Adds a subfolder under a specified folder without path resolution.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2DelFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PSYS_IROV2_FOLDER_ENTRY pCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName)
methods.description: Deletes a folder by name, with checks for removability.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2DelFolder2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PSYS_IROV2_FOLDER_ENTRY pCurFolder)
methods.description: Deletes a folder given its entry, cleaning up subfolders and records.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2ResetFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PSYS_IROV2_FOLDER_ENTRY pCurFolder)
methods.description: Removes all records and subfolders inside a folder, resetting it.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2GetFolderByName(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PSYS_IROV2_FOLDER_ENTRY pCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName)
methods.description: Retrieves a folder by a path string, resolving nested folders.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2GetFolderByName2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PSYS_IROV2_FOLDER_ENTRY pCurFolder,char * pSubFolderName)
methods.description: Retrieves a direct subfolder matching a name under a given folder.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2GetFolderByIndex(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PSYS_IROV2_FOLDER_ENTRY pCurFolder,ULONG ulIndex)
methods.description: Retrieves a subfolder by its index within the parent's subfolder list.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2AddRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PSYS_IROV2_FOLDER_ENTRY pCurFolder,char * pRecordName,ULONG ulRecordType,ULONG ulContentType,PVOID pWriteBuffer,ULONG ulWriteSize)
methods.description: Creates or replaces a record with specified data within a folder.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2DelRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PSYS_IROV2_FOLDER_ENTRY pCurFolder,char * pRecordName)
methods.description: Deletes a record by name within a folder.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroV2SetRecord(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PSYS_IROV2_FOLDER_ENTRY pCurFolder,char * pRecordName,ULONG ulRecordType,ULONG ulContentType,PVOID pWriteBuffer,ULONG ulWriteSize)
methods.description: Updates an existing record with new data or creates a new record if not found.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2GetRecordByName(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PSYS_IROV2_FOLDER_ENTRY pCurFolder,char * pRecordName)
methods.description: Retrieves a record by name within the specified folder.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroV2GetRecordByIndex(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PSYS_IROV2_FOLDER_ENTRY pCurFolder,ULONG ulIndex)
methods.description: Retrieves a record by its index within the folder.

ctags.name: SysIroV2AddRecord
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PSYS_IROV2_FOLDER_ENTRY pCurFolder,char * pRecordName,ULONG ulRecordType,ULONG ulContentType,PVOID pWriteBuffer,ULONG ulWriteSize)

ctags.name: SysIroV2SetRecord
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PSYS_IROV2_FOLDER_ENTRY pCurFolder,char * pRecordName,ULONG ulRecordType,ULONG ulContentType,PVOID pWriteBuffer,ULONG ulWriteSize)
